wikipedia_page.main: John Rae (20 November 1917 – 20 November 1917), sometimes misidentifed as James or Jim Rae, was a Scottish footballer who played as a left back for Rutherglen, Third Lanark (two spells, winning the Scottish Cup in 1889 in the first), Sunderland Albion and Scotland (gaining two caps between 1889 and 1890).

response: *John Rae (footballer, born 1862), Scottish footballer for Third Lanark, Sunderland Albion, Scotland – sometimes misidentifed as Jim Rae
